metadata.title: CVE-2022-1975 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: There is a sleep-in-atomic bug in /net/nfc/netlink.c that allows anattacker to crash the Linux kernel by simulating a nfc device fromuser-space.
